charinfo.name: Yondaime Minato
charinfo.description: The fourth Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; considered to be one of the fastest ninja ever, Minato is a talented man, and the father of Uzumaki Naruto, and the one who sealed the Kyuubi inside of him. Having mastered the time-space skills, Minato is capable of merging them with powerful ninjutsu for powerful effects.

abilities.name: Hiraishin Rasengan
abilities.description: Minato teleports behind an enemy, dealing 35 damage that ignores invulnerability to them. The following turn, this skill will cost only 1 Ninjutsu. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

abilities.name: Space-Time Barrier
abilities.description: Using his space-time abilities, Minato targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the first new harmful skill used on that ally will be reflected onto the enemy team and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Partial Dead Demon Consuming Seal
abilities.description: Using a partial seal, Minato seals part of one enemy away, dealing 25 affliction damage to them, and permanently lowering their non-affliction damage by 5. Minato will also receive 15 affliction damage.

abilities.name: Kunai Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Yondaime Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.
